contents.text: Welcome to Shutterfly Peninsula, your home for personalized photo gifts and stationery.
For assistance with existing orders, account information, or technical support, press 1.
For order status or changes to an existing order, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our order support team.

navigationGoals: Check the shipping status of my last Shutterfly order
I need to update the shipping address on the commemorative photo book I ordered for my military reunion.
Query the ETA for order #123456, check its tracking status, and update the delivery address.
I need to update the shipping address on my recent photo gift order.
I want to update the shipping address on my recent photo calendar order.

contents.text: For account questions or technical support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with technical support for your account.

navigationGoals: Reset my account password to access my Shutterfly account
I can’t log into my Shutterfly account to access my service photos and need help resetting my password.
Troubleshoot a login failure, reset my account credentials, and enable two-factor authentication.
I forgot my account password and need help resetting it.
I need help recovering my account password to access my projects.

contents.text: To create a new photo book, customize photo cards, or explore stationery products, press 2.
To start a new photo book or customize a photo card, press 1.
Please hold as we transfer you to our creative services team.

navigationGoals: Start designing a custom photo book for this month's client presentations
I want to start a new photo book documenting my deployment photos.
Initiate a new 20-page lay-flat wedding photo book with custom bleed margins and color-corrected layouts.
I want to start designing a new photo book with my family pictures.
I'd like to start a new photo book project for my physics lab group.

contents.text: To learn about photo sharing and our stationery options, press 2.
Please hold as we connect you to our product information team.

navigationGoals: Get a quick overview of available stationery products and photo-sharing options
I’m looking for information on sharing photos with my veteran support group and exploring thank-you stationery options.
Get specs on archival-grade stationery substrates and cloud-based photo-sharing integration options.
I’d like information on your stationery and card design options.
I'm interested in learning about your stationery paper options for note cards.
